title: Bug in missions?
body:
i was doing the mission level 1 a short task, the first game i played it accepted the minions i killed, the next game that i won, it didnt aceppt the victory . How can i fix this?
i closed it and opened it again but it didnt do anything
Please help.

replies.body: Oh snap that's no good. I had to do a bit of investigating, but it looks like you changed your icon to the Mechs vs Minions icon before winning that game. The missions need to be completed using one of the Arcade Icons equipped, so be sure to switch it back to one of those!
